title: Model-Based Learning

definitions.Model-Based Learning: A type of machine learning where a model is created to represent the data and then used to make predictions or decisions.

formulas: The formula for calculating the accuracy of a model is: Accuracy = (True Positives + True Negatives) / (True Positives + True Negatives + False Positives + False Negatives)
summary: The slide introduces Model-Based Learning, a machine learning approach where a model is built to represent data for making predictions or decisions. It includes a formula for calculating model accuracy.
